channel.title: How to get rid of quests? Delta 317 source
channel.description: Alright so I've recently been working on this new source I picked up and I don't like the idea of quests in a private server, especially since they limit certain items unless you complete them. I've been searching through everything to try and find out how to correctly delete them, but it always ends up with a huge error. Basically what I need is to get rid of the text in the questlog, get rid of the requirements on certain items/prayers, and get rid of the quests and the npc's assosiated with them. I realize this is going to be difficult to do, so any help at all is greatly appreciated. Thanks in advance!

item.title: How to get rid of quests? Delta 317 source
item.dc:creator: @Skaternerd7 Skaternerd7
item.description:
@Skaternerd7 wrote:

[quote=“Da Vinci, post:5, topic:351490”][quote author=Skaternerd7 link=topic=447846.msg3286929#msg3286929 date=1280257806]
Alright thank you very much, will let you know how it goes.

EDIT: Ehh…any way you could be a bit more specific with the backspace? i deleted like everything that has to do with quests, got 100 errors…
[/quote]

You’ve probably forgot a few } here and there.[/quote]

Alright. Will try adding them where they seem logical. I’m pretty new to all this so it’ll probably take awhile.

Read full topic

item.title: How to get rid of quests? Delta 317 source
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

All you need to know is how to use the backspace key. All of the shit dealing with quests is in client.java, clickingMost.java, player.java, and textHandler.java.

Read full topic

item.title: How to get rid of quests? Delta 317 source
item.dc:creator: @James-RevolutionX James-RevolutionX
item.description:
@James-RevolutionX wrote:

Delete them in client and player I belive, then delete the rights needed to wield the items.

Read full topic
